FuncDef: The display device command displays basic information of all operating devices. The information includes the power and fan module information.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the PIC information on a interface board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a board is faulty or in device routine maintenance, the display device command can be used to display information about the board or module. For example, you can view the running status of the board, power module, or fan module. The information helps you check whether the device is running properly.
Precautions
After the fault is rectified, run the display device command to view the hardware status and the registration status. The information helps you check whether the faulty component is recovered and running properly.
